name: scrambles
description: A library to generate puzzle scrambles.

scripts.build: npm run build-esm && npm run build-cjs
scripts.build-esm: npx esbuild --target=es2020 --bundle --format=esm --splitting --minify --external:worker_threads --external:comlink --external:comlink/dist/esm/comlink.js --external:comlink/dist/esm/comlink.mjs  --external:comlink/dist/umd/node-adapter.js --external:cubing --external:crypto --external:cubing/alg --external:path --outdir=dist/esm src/lib/worker/index-esm.js src/lib/worker/_worker-entry.js ; cp -R src/dist-static/esm/* dist/esm/
scripts.build-cjs: npx esbuild --target=es2020 --bundle --format=cjs --minify --external:worker_threads --external:comlink --external:comlink/dist/esm/comlink.js --external:comlink/dist/esm/comlink.mjs  --external:comlink/dist/umd/node-adapter.js --external:cubing --external:crypto --external:cubing/alg --external:path --outdir=dist/cjs src/lib/worker/index-cjs.js src/lib/worker/_worker-entry.js ; cp -R src/dist-static/cjs/* dist/cjs/
scripts.build-types: npx tsc src/lib/worker/index.ts --declaration --emitDeclarationOnly --outDir dist/types --target es2017 --module es2020 --moduleResolution node --lib esnext,dom --resolveJsonModule --allowJs --allowSyntheticDefaultImports # TODO: unify with tsconfig.json
scripts.prepack: npm run clean && npm run build
